trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality required by a single data source at the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EnvDTE.Project" name="EnvDTE.Project" href=""></xref> level.
trans-unit.target: 實作在單一資料來源所需的基本功能<xref uid="langword_csharp_EnvDTE.Project" name="EnvDTE.Project" href=""></xref>層級。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, closes this stream and the underlying stream gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> image that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會關閉這個資料流與基礎資料流取得<xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>代表資料來源的映像。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> image that represents the data source is typically used in design-time pickers.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>代表資料來源的映像通常用於設計階段選擇器。</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> image that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref>代表資料來源的映像。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the value indicating whether the data source is designable.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得值，指出是否為可設計資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the data source is designable, meaning that an instance of this type will be added to the design surface when binding.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否可設計的這表示，此類型的執行個體時，就會加入至設計介面繫結資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Designable data sources are bound by instance rather than by type.
trans-unit.target: 設計資料來源繫結執行個體，而不是由型別。

trans-unit.source: Data sources of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> are designable.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source is designable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料來源是設計;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得資料來源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source must be unique across all data sources at the `EnvDTE.Project` level.
trans-unit.target: 在所有的資料來源，資料來源的名稱必須是唯一`EnvDTE.Project`層級。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the fully qualified type name of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得資料來源的完整限定的類型名稱。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified type name of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源的完整限定的類型名稱。
